Test Name: Verify Donation UI Appears on Withdrawal Page
Pre-conditions: Application running, User logged in, Test account exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Banking App
2. Log in with credentials
3. Click on Withdraw in sidebar
4. Verify donation checkbox visible
5. Verify label text
6. Navigate to Deposit page
7. Verify donation checkbox NOT visible
Expected Results:
✅ Donation visible on Withdraw
✅ Label shows $5 amount  
✅ Not visible on Deposit

Pre-conditions: User on Withdraw page, Donation checkbox visible
Test Steps:
1. Observe checkbox initial state
2. Click checkbox
3. Verify becomes checked
4. Click again
5. Verify becomes unchecked
6. Click label text
7. Verify checkbox toggles
8. Hover over checkbox
9. Verify pointer cursor
Expected Results:
✅ Starts unchecked
✅ Clicking toggles state
✅ Label click toggles
✅ Pointer cursor on hover
✅ Visual feedback works

Test Name: Verify Correct Amount Deduction With Donation
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Withdraw
2. Select test account
3. Note balance: $10000
4. Enter withdrawal: $50
5. Check donation checkbox
6. Click withdraw button
7. Wait for success message
8. Verify message content
9. Note new balance
10. Calculate: $10000 - $55 = $9945
Expected Results:
✅ Initial: $10000
✅ Withdrawal: $50
✅ Donation: $5
✅ Total: $55
✅ New balance: $9945
✅ Success message mentions donation

Test Name: Verify Correct Amount Deduction Without Donation
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Withdraw
2. Select test account  
3. Note balance: $10000
4. Enter withdrawal: $75
5. Do NOT check donation
6. Click withdraw button
7. Wait for success message
8. Verify message content
9. Note new balance
10. Calculate: $10000 - $75 = $9925
Expected Results:
✅ Initial: $10000
✅ Withdrawal: $75
✅ Donation: $0
✅ Total: $75
✅ New balance: $9925
✅ No donation in message

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Withdraw
2. Transaction 1: $100 with donation
3. Verify balance: $9895
4. Transaction 2: $50 without donation
5. Verify balance: $9845
6. Transaction 3: $25 with donation
7. Verify balance: $9815
8. Verify messages appropriate
Expected Results:
✅ Each transaction correct
✅ Checkbox resets after each
✅ Balances accurate
✅ Messages reflect donation status

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Withdraw
2. Select account with $50
3. Enter withdrawal: $50
4. Check donation ($5)
5. Click withdraw button
6. Observe result
Expected Results:
✅ Transaction fails
✅ Error message shown
✅ Balance stays $50
✅ Can retry with adjustments

Test Steps:
1. Locate donation container
2. Verify background: #f0f8ff
3. Verify border: 1px solid #4CAF50
4. Verify padding: 15px
5. Verify border-radius: 5px
6. Verify checkbox: 18px × 18px
7. Verify font size: 16px
8. Verify font weight: 500
9. Verify emoji present
10. Test responsive design
Expected Results:
✅ All styling correct
✅ Good visual hierarchy
✅ Colors have contrast
✅ Checkbox easily clickable
✅ Responsive on all devices

Test Steps:
For each browser:
1. Open application
2. Log in
3. Navigate to Withdraw
4. Verify checkbox appears
5. Test toggle functionality
6. Perform withdrawal with donation
7. Verify balance updates
8. Check console for errors
Expected Results:
✅ Consistent across browsers
✅ Checkbox works in all
✅ No JavaScript errors
✅ Calculations correct
